  1. Payment is due within 30 days from the date of invoice unless otherwise agreed in writing. Late payments may incur interest charges of 1.5% per month.
  2. Any disputes regarding this invoice must be raised within 7 days of the invoice date. Failure to notify us of any disputes within this period will be considered acceptance of the invoiced amount.
  3. The delivery of goods is subject to our standard shipping terms. We are not responsible for delays caused by external factors
